changeSet.sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uidx_device_pings_device_id ON device_pings (device_id) WHERE active = TRUE

rollback.sql: ALTER TABLE device_pings DROP INDEX uidx_device_pings_device_id

changeSet.author: anastasia.yurkova2003@gmail.com
changeSet.sql: UPDATE device_pings AS dp SET active = TRUE FROM ( SELECT device_id, MAX(inserted_date_at_utc) AS max_inserted_date FROM device_pings GROUP BY device_id ) AS latest_pings WHERE dp.device_id = latest_pings.device_id AND dp.inserted_date_at_utc = latest_pings.max_inserted_date
